page.title: 03FARMING:THORNTON CLEVELEYS
page.content: { MR HODGKINSON,}A FARMER OF RAIKES FARM, IS OUR NEXT DOOR NEIGHBOUR.HE USED TO OWN THE FIELD IN WHICH OUR SCHOOL IS BUILT. HIS FARM IS MAINLY PASTURE AND HE KEEPS COWS AND SHEEP. HE ALSO REARS GEESE AND TURKEYS FOR CHRISTMAS. BECAUSE HE IS SO NEAR THE TOWN HE HAS A LOT OF TROUBLE WITH VANDALS BREAKING FENCES, DOGS WORRYING SHEEP AND PEOPLE DUMPING LITTER. ONE DAY HIS LAND WILL BE USED FOR BUILDING HOUSES ON BUT FOR NOW IT IS PLEASANT TO SIT ON OUR FIELD ON A NICE DAY AND LOOK AT THE VIEW{.BY LOUISE HUNT.}
